summary: Social platform called Sanchaari with personalized profiles, unique usernames, photo uploads via dropbox, saved posts, role-based user system (common user, author, group head, content creator, subscriber, administrator), separate Home feed (all posts) and Updates feed (verified users only), and bottom navigation (home/feed, updates/news, resources, profile)
architectural_notes: Building incrementally - starting with core learning features
Verification badge system to distinguish verified users
Bottom navigation pattern with Home (social feed), Updates (news feed), Resources, and Profile tabs
Unique username enforcement - usernames must be globally unique across all users
Saved posts feature for bookmarking content
Home feed displays all posts (public), Updates feed displays only verified user posts
Admin dashboard implemented in phases: Phase 1 (User Management), Phase 2 (Content Moderation), Phase 3 (Test/Resource Management), Phase 4 (Analytics)
Username 'admin' automatically receives administrator role upon registration - no hardcoded credentials needed
